item.title: Star rating control in Adaptive Cards

item.title: How to get notifications on PnP samples shared on GitHub
item.description: How to get notifications on PnP samples shared on GitHub Power Automate can be used to get notifications for PnP samples shared on GitHub or to get reminded on any commits and pull requests in any of your favorite GitHub repos.
item.dc:creator: Albert-Jan Schot

item.title: Series: How to build Power Apps that don't look like Power Apps - auto-height textinput - Material Design part 3
item.description: Some controls in Power Apps do not have an auto height property, which means that we can’t get the Height of a control to automagically ✨ adjust to its content.
Some controls in Power Apps do not have an auto height property, which means that we can’t get the Height of a control to automagically ✨ adjust to its content.

item.title: Build a vacation tracker app with Lists and SharePoint for Teams
item.description: When it is summer or the holidays season, we know it is vacation time.

item.title: How to register SPFx field customizers with the SharePoint REST API
item.description: In this article, learn how to register SPFx field customizers using SharePoint’s REST API. See how you can do this our utility web part you can use in your sites!

item.dc:creator: Andrew Connell

item.title: How Manage Azure SQL server Firewall using Power Platform
item.description: How to manage SQL Azure firewall from a Business Application on Power Platform Today we will make use of one premium SQL Server connector and four (04) standard connectors (SharePoint, Office 365 Outlook, Office 365 Users, Power Apps).

item.title: How to generate an HTML table with the output of a SQL Server query and send it from Outlook by using Power Platform
item.description: How to generate an HTML table with a SQL Server query and send it from Outlook using Power Platform We will make use of the Premium SQL Server connector and the standard Outlook connector.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 - how cool is that? - Configuring settings
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx projects (yes, that as well 🤩. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check CLI for Microsoft 365 settings and how to configure them.

CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx projects (yes, that as well 🤩. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check CLI for Microsoft 365 settings and how to configure them.
item.dc:creator: Adam Wójcik

item.title: Patterns and Practices for SPFx Development
item.description: When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.
When building any solution, whether it is SPFx-based or with any other programming language, it is best to make it loosely coupled to achieve easy maintenance and scalability.
item.dc:creator: Dipesh Bhanani

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 - how cool is that? - Tips and tricks
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool based on Node.js that helps you manage many things around Microsoft 365 and your SPFx project (yes, that as well 🤩. rename, upgrade … you name it). You may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course). The list keeps on growing and growing. Lets check some tips and tricks which may improve your experience with CLI for Microsoft 365.

item.title: How to Display Data from Multiple SharePoint Lists using PnPjs and DataTables
item.description: In this article, we will learn how to use PnPjs to get data from multiple SharePoint lists and display the collected data in a jQuery Datatables in SharePoint 2013/2016/2019 or online without a SPFx webpart.
